verses.name: 2 Samuel 24:10
verses.text: And David’s heart smote him after that he had numbered the people. And David said unto the Lord, I have sinned greatly in that I have done: and now, I beseech thee, O Lord, take away the iniquity of thy servant; for I have done very foolishly.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 24:11
verses.text: For when David was up in the morning, the word of the Lord came unto the prophet Gad, David’s seer, saying,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 24:12
verses.text: Go and say unto David, Thus saith the Lord, I offer thee three things; choose thee one of them, that I may do it unto thee.
